briefdescription.para: Reads users from a text file and creates a user list.

detaileddescription.para: This function reads users from a text file and creates a user list. The user list is created by calling the createUserList function.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the head node of the user list

simplesect.para: A pointer to the head node of the user list

briefdescription.para: setUsersData - Reads user data from a binary file and creates a linked list of users. @headNode: A pointer to a pointer to the head node of the linked list.

detaileddescription.para: This function opens a binary file containing user data and reads each user record into a User struct. It then calls the createUserList function to create a new node in the linked list for each user. The headNode pointer is updated to point to the first node in the list. If the file cannot be opened, NULL is returned.
Return: A pointer to the head node of the linked list.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nif, char name[50], char email[50], int phone, int zip, char password[50], int wallet, bool isManager)
memberdef.name: createUser

detaileddescription.para: This function creates a user with the given parameters and returns a pointer to the user.

parameterdescription.para: The NIF of the user
The name of the user
The email of the user
The phone number of the user
The zip code of the user
The password of the user
The wallet balance of the user
A boolean indicating whether the user is a manager or not

simplesect.para: A pointer to the created user

detaileddescription.para: This function creates a new node in the user list with the given user and adds it to the head of the list.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the head node of the user list
The user to be added to the list

simplesect.para: A boolean indicating whether the user list was successfully created or not

detaileddescription.para: This function prints the user list to the console.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the head node of the user list

briefdescription.para: Edits a user in the list with the given NIF.

detaileddescription.para: This function searches for a user in the list with the given NIF and edits it with the given user.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the head node of the user list
The NIF of the user to be edited
The user to replace the old user

simplesect.para: A boolean indicating whether the user was successfully edited or not

briefdescription.para: Deletes a user from the list.

detaileddescription.para: This function searches for a user in the list with the given NIF and deletes it from the list.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the head node of the user list
The NIF of the user to be deleted

simplesect.para: A boolean indicating whether the user was successfully deleted or not

briefdescription.para: Stores the user list in a binary file.

detaileddescription.para: This function stores the user list in a binary file.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the head node of the user list

simplesect.para: A boolean indicating whether the user list was successfully stored or not

briefdescription.para: Searches for a user in the list with the given NIF.

detaileddescription.para: This function searches for a user in the list with the given NIF and returns a boolean indicating whether the user was found or not.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the head node of the user list
The NIF of the user to be searched for

simplesect.para: A boolean indicating whether the user was found or not

briefdescription.para: File containing the functions to manage the users.

detaileddescription.para: This file contains the implementation of functions to manage users, such as reading users from a text file, creating a user, creating a user list, printing a user list, editing a user, deleting a user, storing users in a binary file, and searching for a user by NIF.
